about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling journey in the Sci-fi and Fantasy-themed Thear planet with the Action-RPG game Galaxy Chronicle: The Moon King Tale.

Join Ben Echo and Anna Echo on their quest to explore the world and search for the source of their Stearone power while thwarting the plans of the dictator Keineus Erebus.

KEY FEATURES

  • SET ON THE BEAUTIFUL AND VIBRANT PLANET THEAR, one of the planets discovered several thousand years ago. The lands here are blessed with powers coming from ancient artifacts called Stearone. Filled to the brim with forests, mountains, deserts, seas, dungeons, and mysterious caves, the world is waiting for the player to explore. Using 2.5D graphics - a fusion of 2D art and 3D environment - as the main artstyle, Thear planet is presented to you full of color and depth.

  • THEAR IS FULL OF POSSIBILITIES - Day/Night system ensures that encounters, events, and quests vary throughout the in-game day, Mysterious islands, which are only accessible by specialized ships, remain uncharted and full of mysteries, and more.

  • CHOOSE YOUR ADVENTURER - Ben and Anna both possess a wide variety of unique abilities, skills, and weapons. Pick your favorite playstyle or try something else; it's all up to you.

  • JRPG CORE FEATURES - Weapon upgrades and evolution, skill tree expansion, weakness break, and ability burst, all of which a JRPG should have. Combine with unique mechanisms such as robot control and monster DNA transformation to give yourself an edge in combat and exploration while keeping the game fresh yet familiar.
    The combat system involves avoiding, parrying, counterattacking, and staggering targets. Tinker with the expansive skill system to devastate enemies and achieve victory.

  • AND OTHER INTERESTING THINGS -
    Inventor, the system in which the player collects ideas through taking photos to craft specific items. Keep exploring Thear for even more ideas.
    Minigames such as monster chess, monster taming, fish catching, fish racing, and fish farming are included in Thear as well.

An exciting journey awaits you!

short_description: This is an Action-RPG game. The game's world is themed as a mix of Sci-fi and Fantasy, the story will take place on a Thear planet. Players will take on the role of Ben Echo and Anna Echo on their journey to explore the world, the source of their power, and stop the dictator Keineus Erebus.
